SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.DAY_DIV ,A.WAY_DIV ,B.REP_ROUT_NM ,B.ROUT_TYPE ,(SELECT STTN_NM FROM BMS_STTN_MST WHERE STTN_ID = A.ST_STTN_ID AND DEL_YN!='Y') ST_STTN_NM ,(SELECT STTN_NM FROM BMS_STTN_MST WHERE STTN_ID = A.ED_STTN_ID AND DEL_YN!='Y') ED_STTN_NM ,C.ROUT_ID ,C.ROUT_NM FROM BRT_OPER_PL_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST B ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST C ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = C.REP_ROUT_ID AND A.WAY_DIV = C.WAY_DIV AND C.DEL_YN != 'Y'
AND (C.ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || B.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND C.ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND B.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
GROUP BY C.ROUT_ID, A.DAY_DIV ORDER BY A.REP_ROUT_ID, A.DAY_DIV, A.WAY_DIV, C.ROUT_ID
